casebody.data:
CITY OF ORLANDO and Relation Insurance Services, Appellants,
v.
John BEST, Appellee. No. 1D18-2902 District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District. Date of Accident: November 23, 2011
April 15, 2019
Rehearing Denied June 4, 2019 Kristen L. Magana of Broussard, Cullen & Blastic, P.A., Orlando, for Appellants. Lawrence H. Hornsby of Hornsby Law, Winter Park, and Wendy S. Loquasto of Fox & Loquasto, LLC, Tallahassee, for Appellee. Per Curiam.

AFFIRMED .

B.L. Thomas, C.J., and Lewis and Roberts, JJ., concur.
